mapper.update:
update auditions
student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grade_id = #{gradeId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
subject_id = #{subjectId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
come_from = #{comeFrom,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
cooperator_id = #{cooperatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where audition_id = #{auditionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update auditions set student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade_id = #{gradeId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, subject_id = #{subjectId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, come_from = #{comeFrom,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, cooperator_id = #{cooperatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consultant_group_id = #{consultantGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consultant_id = #{consultantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where audition_id = #{auditionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT consultant_id AS consultantId,COUNT(1) AS distributionNum,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM auditions WHERE A.consultant_id = consultant_id AND `status` = 3) AS completeNum FROM auditions A GROUP BY consultant_id

SELECT CG.consultant_group_name AS consultantGroupName ,COUNT(1) AS totalDistributionNum FROM consultant_group CG INNER JOIN auditions A ON CG.consultant_group_id = A.consultant_group_id GROUP BY CG.consultant_group_id
